Product Manager: backlog prioritization, roadmapping, and release planning
Project Manager: scope management, scheduling, and risk tracking
Registered Nurse (ICU): ventilator management, ICU protocols and medication titration
Pharmacist: inventory management, stock control, and regulatory compliance
High School Teacher: instructional design, lesson planning and classroom management
University Lecturer: research-led teaching, curriculum development and academic advising
Research Assistant: lab protocols, statistical analysis and literature review
Policy Analyst: stakeholder consultation, data analysis and recommendations
Social Worker: case management, needs assessment and safeguarding protocols
Graphic Designer: visual identity, brand assets and digital content
